text:
### Profile

```
POST /api/profile
```

Request: 

```
{
	token: "example"
}
```

Response:

```javascript
{
    "success": true,
    "profile": {
        "id": 1,
        "username": "Username",
        "name": "Full name",
        "created": 1569308571189,
        "admin": null,
        "email": null,
        "avatar": null,
        "slack_id": null,
        "slack_domain": null,
        "checked_in": false,
        "projects": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "name": "Projekt",
                "owner": 1
            }
        ]
    }

}
```
title: POST profile
